description.p: Iaito is the official graphical interface for radare2, a libre reverse engineering framework.

ul.li: Focus on simplicity, parity with commands, keybindings and r2-style workflows.
Use r2 plugins (f.ex: no need for r2ghidra-iaito plugin if r2ghidra is installed)
Aims to cover other radare2 features, not just a disassembler (forensics, networking, bindiffing, solvers, ...).
